scripts.start: ( Write-Output 'Powershell' && ./scripts/local_invoke.bat ) || ( CALL ./scripts/local_invoke.bat ) || ( bash -c 'uname -a | grep -q -i Linux' && bash -c ./scripts/local_invoke.sh ) ||( bash -c 'uname -a | grep -q -i Darwin' && bash -c ./scripts/local_invoke.sh )
scripts.debug: node ./scripts/generateEnvVars.mjs && nodemon --ext "ts,json,yaml" --exec "sam build -c -p && sam local start-api -d 9999 --parameter-overrides Environment=develop -n scripts/env_vars.json --host 0.0.0.0 --profile default --region us-east-1"
scripts.dev: node ./scripts/generateEnvVars.mjs && nodemon --ext "ts,json,yaml" --exec "sam build -c -p && sam local start-api --parameter-overrides Environment=develop -n scripts/env_vars.json --host 0.0.0.0 --profile default --region us-east-1"
